page.title: 07Farm Facts And Figures (2)
page.content: {The livestock comprises : {====================================== HEIFERS FOR MILK = 350 ) HEIFERS FOR CALVES = 80 ) COWS = BULLS FOR SERVICE = 3 ) 1042 OTHER COWS = 609 ) (MAINLY FOR SLAUGHTER) ====================================== EWES FOR BREEDING = 2004 ) SHEEP = RAMS FOR SERVICE = 52 ) 4881 LAMBS = 2825 ) ====================================== {Labour used on the farm : ====================================== SALARIED MANAGERS = 2 ) TOTAL FULLTIME FAMILY WORKERS = 1 ) LABOUR HIRED WORKERS (MALE = 22 ) = 25 (FEMALE = 1 ) ====================================== {Please also note that 1 Youth Training {Scheme Person is employed . 14 Tonnes {of Hay are also kept in store .
